com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.model

Class ObservableLoadingStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.model.ObservableLoadingStatus

  • public class ObservableLoadingStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the current loading status that can be observed in UI controls. Singleton.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean apiLoadFailure
      Boolean to check if the Steam API loaded
      private boolean databaseFailure
      Boolean to check if the database connected
      private static ObservableLoadingStatus INSTANCE 
      private long lastCompletionMillis
      Last successful api data load completion time
      private javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<LoadingStatus> loadingStatus
      Contains the current loading status

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getErrorMessages()
      Returns a list that contains all current errors in separate strings
      static ObservableLoadingStatus getInstance() 
      long getLastCompletionMillis()
      Returns the time stamp of the last loading completion (system time in milliseconds).
      javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<LoadingStatus> getLoadingStateProperty()
      Get load state property that can be bound to observers
      void setApiLoadFailure()
      Sets a flag that shows that the api data was not loaded successfully so final status will be failure.
      void setDatabaseFailure()
      Sets a flag that shows that the database data was not loaded successfully so final status will be failure.

      Set the current loading state.

        Set the current loading state. Can be set from any thread, events (notifying observers) are posted to event queue.
